example.eg: This divided pie chart will help students visualize fractions.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 被分割的, 分开的, 分开的

example.eg: Twenty-seven divided by nine is three.
The divided citizenry could not unite on any issue.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 意见不合的，意见相左的

example.eg: The generations are divided by their taste in music, clothing, communication style, and almost everything else.
The teacher asked the children to divide the animals according to what they ate.
example.egtrans: 老师要求孩子们按照动物吃的东西，把动物分类。

example.eg: Biologists divide insects into different orders.
example.egtrans: 生物学家把昆虫区分成不同的目。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把…分类成, 把…区分成

example.eg: Sift the flour then divide into three equal portions.
example.egtrans: 把面粉过一遍筛子，然后分成均等的三份。

example.eg: We normally use long division to divide a decimal by a whole number.
example.egtrans: 我们一般使用长除法，用整数除小数。

example.eg: Twelve divided by six is two.
Plans to build a supermarket on the outskirts of the town have divided opinion.
example.egtrans: 在小镇郊区建造超市的计划使大家产生了意见上的分歧。

example.eg: The safety of GM crops is a controversial subject that divides people.
example.egtrans: 转基因谷物是一个极具争议的话题，使民众产生分歧。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使...产生分歧, 使...分裂

example.eg: The divide between the rich and the poor is becoming wider.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 分歧, 不同, 差异

example.eg: This number game will help children learn to divide.
Take the right fork when the road divides.
The study investigates the influence of divided attention on the performance of car drivers.

dsense.name: divided highway, dual highway (US), dual carriageway (UK)

example.eg: The divided highway that runs through town was once known as 'Main Street'.
example.egtrans: 从前，贯穿小镇的双向公路被称为“主街道”。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 双向车道公路, 双向公路
